content: single_crochet in each single_crochet around 15 single_crochet 13th row 1 single_crochet in each of next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 3 times 1 single_crochet in each of remaining 3 single_crochet 18 single_crochet 14th 15th row 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet fasten_off leaving 10-­ 12 yarn length for sewing caudal fin bottom repeat row 1-­ 8th of dorsal fin slip_stitch in next single_crochet fasten_off leaving 10-­ 12 yarn length for sewing sew top and bottom tail fins to end of body pelvic fins make two 1st row chain 2 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from the hook 6 single_crochet 2nd row 2 single_crochet in each of next 3 single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of remaining 3sc 9 single_crochet 3rd row 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 9 single_crochet 4th row 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 3 times 1 single_crochet in each of remaining 3 single_crochet 12 single_crochet 5th row 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet fasten_off leaving 10-­ 12 yarn length for sewing sew each pelvic fin on row 37-­ 42 parallel to the pectoral fins see figs 1 and 2
